SELECT PROD.PROD_ID AS prodId , PROD.PROD_GRD_CD AS prodGrdCd , PROD.REG_DT AS regDt
, PROD_IMG.FILE_PATH AS imgFilePath , PROD_IMG.FILE_NM AS imgFileNm
, ALBUM_PROD.ALBUM_TYPE_NM AS albumTypeNm , ALBUM_PROD.ISSUE_DAY AS issueDay , ALBUM_PROD.CHNL_COMP_NM AS chnlCompNm , ALBUM_PROD.AGENCY_NM AS agencyNm
, PROD_DESC.PROD_NM AS prodNm , PROD_DESC.PROD_BASE_DESC AS prodBaseDesc , PROD_DESC.ARTIST1_NM AS artist1Nm , PROD_DESC.ARTIST1_ID AS artist1Id
, MENU_DESC_TOP.MENU_ID AS topMenuId , MENU_DESC_TOP.MENU_NM AS topMenuNm , MENU_DESC_TOP.MENU_DESC AS topMenuDesc , MENU_DESC_BOTTOM.MENU_ID AS menuId , MENU_DESC_BOTTOM.MENU_NM AS menuNm , MENU_DESC_BOTTOM.MENU_DESC AS menuDesc
FROM TB_DP_PROD PROD INNER JOIN TB_DP_ALBUM_PROD ALBUM_PROD ON ALBUM_PROD.PROD_ID = PROD.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD_DESC PROD_DESC ON PROD_DESC.PROD_ID = PROD.PROD_ID AND PROD_DESC.ARTIST1_ID = #{artistId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROD_DESC.LANG_CD = #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD_IMG PROD_IMG ON PROD_IMG.PROD_ID = PROD.PROD_ID AND PROD_IMG.IMG_CD = #{imgCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROD_IMG.LANG_CD = #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} INNER JOIN TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG MENU_MAPG ON MENU_MAPG.PROD_ID = PROD.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC MENU_DESC_TOP ON MENU_DESC_TOP.MENU_ID = PROD.TOP_MENU_ID AND MENU_DESC_TOP.LANG_CD = #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} INNER JOIN TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC MENU_DESC_BOTTOM ON MENU_DESC_BOTTOM.MENU_ID = MENU_MAPG.MENU_ID AND MENU_DESC_BOTTOM.LANG_CD = #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ALBUM_PROD.ISSUE_DAY DESC
